ai-tha-ap278:1.1_0: “The Teacher, the roar of the Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap278:1.3_0: A jute robe that’s given to me,
ai-tha-ap278:1.4_0: supremely worthy of a religious donation;
ai-tha-ap278:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap278:2.4_0: on the bamboo and the fruit.
ai-tha-ap278:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Potaliya.
